mapper.select: SELECT Q.Q_NO, Q.MEM_NO, Q.Q_CON, Q.Q_DT, MEM_NM, Q.Q_SECRET, Q.Q_RE_NO, Q.Q_RE_CON, Q.Q_RE_DT FROM ( SELECT Q.Q_NO, Q.MEM_NO, Q.Q_CON, M.MEM_NM , TO_CHAR(Q_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS Q_DT, Q.Q_SECRET, Q.Q_RE_NO, Q.Q_RE_CON, Q.Q_RE_DT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY Q_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM QUESTION Q INNER JOIN MEM M ON Q.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE Q_DEL = 1 ) Q WHERE Q.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTION WHERE Q_DEL = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION(Q_NO, MEM_NO, Q_CON) VALUES (QUESTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sMNo}, #{q_con})
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION SET Q_CON = #{q_con} WHERE Q_NO = #{no}
UPDATE QUESTION SET Q_DEL = 0 WHERE Q_NO = #{no}
UPDATE QUESTION SET Q_RE_NO ='4', Q_RE_CON=#{q_re_con}, Q_RE_DT=SYSDATE WHERE Q_NO = #{no}
UPDATE QUESTION SET Q_RE_NO = null, Q_RE_CON= null, Q_RE_DT=null WHERE Q_NO = #{no}
